DOC.brief_summary: This single center pilot study evaluate immediate effect low-dose acetazolamide respiratory control subject treatment emergent sleep disorder breathing . The purpose study ass immediate effect one-time low-dose acetazolamide sleep breathing ( Treatment Emergent Sleep Disordered Breathing ) TE-CSA subject compare subject ' baseline evaluation without acetazolamide . Investigators also try determine immediate effect one-time low-dose acetazolamide subject ' rest ventilation ventilatory response slope compare subject ' baseline evaluation without acetazolamide .
DOC.brief_title: A Single-center Pilot Study Evaluating Immediate Effects Low-dose Acetazolamide Respiratory Control Subjects With Treatment Emergent Sleep Disordered Breathing
